dct_title_s: A map of Philadelphia and parts adjacent
dct_description_sm: by N. Scull and G. Heap.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
One scale in yards and another in furlongs & miles.
Rural buildings shown pictorially with occupants' names.
Includes text, distance table, and ground-level view of the Statehouse (later Independence Hall).
dct_rights_sm: Images from the David Rumsey Map Center's general collections courtesy of Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
